data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Zhangye.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhangye, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 91,033 believers in Zhangye to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,108,967 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Zhangye, Gansu, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,089,581, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Yugur, Enger people might believe through him.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 91,033 believers in the county of Zhangye.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Zhangye, Gansu, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Zhangye, Gansu, China has a population of 1,200,000.

We estimate Zhangye has 91,033 people who might know Jesus, 19,386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,089,581 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 91,033 believers in Zhangye to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
